personal.name: Neil Huang
personal.age: Full‑stack developer and security researcher (6+ years experience)

timeline.title: Started Coding Journey
timeline.description: Began learning programming at age 5, starting with visual programming languages

timeline.title: Entered github organization
timeline.description: Started working with other developers on reverse engineering projects

timeline.title: ML Research with Georgia Tech
timeline.description: Began research collaboration on VPN traffic classification using machine learning

timeline.title: Joined Haedus Industries & YapeTeam
timeline.description: Contributed to UI frameworks (Skija UI Project) and Minecraft modding clients (YolBi suite), enhancing performance and introducing cross‑platform capabilities.

timeline.title: Expanded Open Source Portfolio
timeline.description: Developed and maintained over 45 repositories across security research, machine learning, and game modding.
